root = self.view.getChild("root")
	tableList = root.getChild("flexTables").getChild("TableList")
	tableLayout = root.getChild("flexTables").getChild("TableLayout")
	emvColQty = root.getChild("flexHead").getChild("emvColQty")
	emvRowQty = root.getChild("flexHead").getChild("emvRowQty")
	
	if not(tableList.props.data):
		return
	
	bedId = tableList.props.data[0].get('bedId') if tableList.props.data else None
	roomId = tableList.props.data[0].get('roomId') if tableList.props.data else None
	facilityId = tableList.props.data[0].get('facilityId') if tableList.props.data else None
	
	try:
		colSize = int(emvColQty.props.params.fieldText)
	except:
		colSize = 0

	try:
		rowSize = int(emvRowQty.props.params.fieldText)  
	except:
		rowSize = 0	
	
	system.perspective.print(('preview: facilityId, roomId :', facilityId, roomId))	
	if facilityId and roomId is None:
		globalLayoutList = root.getFromTableGlobalList(True)
		tableLayout.setGlobalLayout(rowSize, colSize, globalLayoutList)		
		
	elif roomId and facilityId:
		dictError = tableList.validateFacility(rowSize, colSize)
		
		system.perspective.print(('dictError:', dictError))
		tableList.addErrorColumn(dictError)
		
		if dictError:
			tableLayout.ssetFacilityLayout(facilityId, rowSize, colSize, [])
			return
		
		
		facilityLayoutList = root.getFromTableFacilityList(True)
	
		#ystem.perspective.print(('facilityId, rowSize, colSize, facilityLayoutList:', facilityId, rowSize, colSize, facilityLayoutList))
		tableLayout.setFacilityLayout(facilityId, rowSize, colSize, facilityLayoutList)		
	
	elif bedId and roomId:
		dictError = tableList.validateRoom(rowSize, colSize)
		system.perspective.print(('dictError:', dictError))
		tableList.addErrorColumn(dictError)
		
		if dictError:
			tableLayout.setRoomLayout(roomId, rowSize, colSize, [])
			return
			
		roomLayoutList = root.getFromTableRoomList()
	
		#ystem.perspective.print(('roomId, rowSize, colSize, roomLayoutList:', roomId, rowSize, colSize, roomLayoutList))

		tableLayout.setRoomLayout(roomId, rowSize, colSize, roomLayoutList)
	
	else:
		tableLayout.props.data = []

	import extend.layout
	colSize = int(emvColQty.props.params.fieldText) if emvColQty.props.params.fieldText.isnumeric() else 0
	
	rowSize = int(emvRowQty.props.params.fieldText)  if emvRowQty.props.params.fieldText.isnumeric() else 0

	if self.custom._isDev:

			system.perspective.print(('roomLayoutList:'))
			system.perspective.print((system.util.jsonEncode(roomLayoutList)))	
			
			tableLayout.setRoomLayout(roomId, rowSize, colSize, roomLayoutList)

			#system.perspective.print(('matrix:'))
			#system.perspective.print((system.util.jsonEncode(matrix)))	
		else:
			system.perspective.sendMessage('nix')
			tableLayout.props.data = []
			"""

root = self.view.getChild("root")
	tableList = root.getChild("flexTables").getChild("TableList")
	tableLayout = root.getChild("flexTables").getChild("TableLayout")
	emvColQty = root.getChild("flexHead").getChild("emvColQty")
	emvRowQty = root.getChild("flexHead").getChild("emvRowQty")
	
	if not(tableList.props.data):
		return
	
	params = {}
	params['bedId']= tableList.props.data[0].get('bedId') if tableList.props.data else None
	params['roomId']= tableList.props.data[0].get('roomId') if tableList.props.data else None
	params['facilityId'] = tableList.props.data[0].get('facilityId') if tableList.props.data else None
	
	try:
		params['colSize'] = int(emvColQty.props.params.fieldText)
	except:
		params['colSize'] = 0

	try:
		params['rowSize'] = int(emvRowQty.props.params.fieldText)  
	except:
		params['rowSize'] = 0	
		

	
	system.perspective.print(('params:', params))
	if params['facilityId'] and params['roomId']:
		facilityList = root.getFromTableFacilityList()
		params['jsonLayout'] = system.util.jsonEncode(facilityList)
		root.validateLayoutList()
		root.saveToDb(params)
	elif params['roomId'] and params['bedId']:
		roomList = root.getFromTableRoomList()
		params['jsonLayout'] = system.util.jsonEncode(roomList)
		root.validateLayoutList()
		root.saveToDb(params)

customMethods.name: getBedInfo
getMatrixFromList
customMethods.script:
import string
	colPossibleLetters = list(string.ascii_uppercase)[:colSize]
	
	# matrix empty 3x5: [[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}]]
	matrix = [[{} for x in range(colSize)] for j in range(rowSize)]
	
	for item in roomLayoutList:
		bedId = item['bedId']
		bedType = 'v' if item['isVertical'] else 'h' 
		isUpper = item['isUpper']
	
		position = item['position'] 
		posLetter = ''.join([char for  char in position if char.isalpha()])
		posCol = colPossibleLetters.index(posLetter)
		posRow = int(position[len(posLetter):]) - 1
		
		if matrix[posRow][posCol] == {}:
			matrix[posRow][posCol]['type'] = bedType
			matrix[posRow][posCol]['beds'] = [bedId]
		else:
			if isUpper: 
				matrix[posRow][posCol]['beds'].insert(0,bedId)
			else:
				matrix[posRow][posCol]['beds'].append(bedId)
	
	system.perspective.print(('jsonMatrixRoom:'))
	system.perspective.print((system.util.jsonEncode(matrix)))		
	return matrix

customMethods.name: getOccupationDataDb
customMethods.script:
roomId = kwargs.get('roomId')
	facilityId = kwargs.get('facilityId')

	oneDay = system.date.now()	
	
	query = """
DECLARE @oneDay date = ?,
	@roomId int = ?,
	@facilityId int = ?

;WITH frb As (
SELECT 
	 [Facility].[id] AS facilityId
	,[Room].[id] AS roomId
	,[Bed].[id] AS bedId
	,[Facility].[facilityName]
	,[Room].[roomName]
	,[Bed].[bedName]
	,ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1) bedNameNo 
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed]
	INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
	INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Facility] ON [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id]
WHERE ([Facility].[timeRetired] is NULL 
	AND [Room].[timeRetired] is NULL
	AND [Bed].[timeRetired] is NULL) 
)
	
, cteR AS (
SELECT 
	 [bedId]
	,[participantId]
	,[reservationStart]
	,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY [bedId] ORDER BY [reservationStart]) rowNo
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Reservation]  
WHERE ([timeRetired] IS NULL
	AND [reservationStart] IS NOT NULL    
	AND CAST([reservationStart] AS date) <= @oneDay
	AND CAST(ISNULL([reservationEnd],@oneDay) AS date) >= @oneDay)
)

, cteReserved AS (
SELECT 
	 [bedId]
	,CONCAT([Human].[firstName] , ' ', [Human].[middleName] , ' ' , [Human].[lastName]) AS [participantName]
	,[reservationStart]
FROM cteR  
LEFT JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON cteR.[participantId] = [Participant].[id]
LEFT JOIN [humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id]
WHERE rowNo < 2
)

, cteO AS (
SELECT 
	 [bedId]
	,[participantId]
	,[eventStart]
	,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY [bedId] ORDER BY [eventStart]) rowNo
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[BedLog]  
WHERE ([eventStart] IS NOT NULL    
	AND CAST([eventStart] AS date) <= @oneDay
	AND CAST(ISNULL([eventEnd],@oneDay) AS date) >= @oneDay)
)
	
, cteOccupied AS (
SELECT 
	 [bedId]
	,CONCAT([Human].[firstName] , ' ', [Human].[middleName] , ' ' , [Human].[lastName]) AS [participantName]
	,[eventStart]
FROM cteO
LEFT JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON cteO.[participantId] = [Participant].[id]
LEFT JOIN [humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id]
WHERE rowNo < 2
)

SELECT 
	 frb.facilityId
	,frb.roomId
	,frb.bedId
	,frb.[facilityName]
	,frb.[roomName]
	,frb.[bedName]
	,frb.[bedNameNo] 
	,CASE WHEN cteOccupied.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 2 ELSE (CASE WHEN cteReserved.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS [bedStateNo]
	,CASE WHEN cteOccupied.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 'occupied' ELSE (CASE WHEN cteReserved.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 'reserved' ELSE '' END) END AS [bedState]
	,CASE WHEN cteOccupied.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN cteOccupied.[eventStart] ELSE (CASE WHEN cteReserved.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN cteReserved.[reservationStart] ELSE NULL END) END AS [bedStateDate]
	,CASE WHEN cteOccupied.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN cteOccupied.[participantName] ELSE (CASE WHEN cteReserved.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN cteReserved.[participantName] ELSE '' END) END  AS [participantName]
FROM frb 
LEFT JOIN cteReserved ON cteReserved.bedId = frb.bedId
LEFT JOIN cteOccupied ON cteOccupied.bedId = frb.bedId
WHERE 1=1
	AND (@roomId IS NULL OR frb.roomId = @roomId)
	AND (@facilityId IS NULL OR frb.facilityId = @facilityId)

ORDER BY facilityName,facilityId, roomName, roomId, bedNameNo
"""
	args = [oneDay, roomId, facilityId]
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args, 'RITIOps')
	return result

customMethods.name: getGlobalMatrixFromList
customMethods.script:
import string
	import copy
	colPossibleLetters = list(string.ascii_uppercase)[:colSize]
	
	# matrix empty 3x5: [[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}],[{}.{},{}]]
	matrix = [[{} for x in range(colSize)] for j in range(rowSize)]
	#ystem.perspective.print(('globalLayoutList: ',globalLayoutList[:5]))
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('in glob lmatrix: '))
	#ystem.perspective.print(("len matrix: ",len(matrix), len(matrix[0]) ))
	for obj in globalLayoutList:
		facilityId = obj['facilityId']
		facilityLayoutList = system.util.jsonDecode(obj['jsonLayout']) if obj.get('jsonLayout') else []
		facilityRowSize = obj['rowSize']
		facilityColSize = obj['colSize']
		positionF = obj['position'] 
		posLetterF = ''.join([char for  char in positionF if char.isalpha()])
		posColF = colPossibleLetters.index(posLetterF)
		posRowF = int(positionF[len(posLetterF):]) - 1		
		#_matrixFacility = [[{} for x in range(facilityColSize)] for j in range(facilityRowSize)]
		roomsLayout = system.util.jsonDecode(obj['roomsLayout']) if obj.get('roomsLayout') else []
		roomJ = []
		for x in roomsLayout:
			abc = copy.deepcopy(x)
			abc['jsonLayout'] = system.util.jsonEncode(x['jsonLayout']) 
			roomJ.append(abc)
		
		
		#ystem.perspective.print(('roomsJLayout: ', facilityRowSize, facilityColSize, roomJ))
		_matrixFacility = self.getFacilityMatrixFromList(facilityRowSize,facilityColSize, roomJ) #roomsLayout)
		#ystem.perspective.print(('matrixFacility: ',len(matrix), _matrixFacility[:3]))	
		
		for rowIndex , row in enumerate(_matrixFacility):
			for colIndex, item in enumerate(row):
				#ystem.perspective.print(("rowIndex, colIndex, posRow, posCol:",rowIndex, colIndex, posRowF, posColF))
				matrix[posRowF + rowIndex][posColF + colIndex] = item #possible to add border
								
		#ystem.perspective.print(('matrix: ',len(matrix), matrix[:3]))		
	
	return matrix

customMethods.name: getListBedsByRoomDb
customMethods.script:
query = 	"""
DECLARE @roomId int = ?;

SELECT 
	 'bed' AS [objectType]
	,[Room].[id] AS [roomId]
	,[Bed].[id] AS [bedId]
	,[Room].[roomName]
	,[Bed].[bedName]
	,ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1) AS [bedNameNo] 
	,'' AS [position]
	,cast(0 AS bit) AS [isVertical]
	,cast(0 AS bit) AS [isUpper]
	,'' AS [error]
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed]
	INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
WHERE 1=1
	AND [Room].[timeRetired] is NULL
	AND [Bed].[timeRetired] is NULL
	AND [Room].[Id] = @roomId
ORDER BY [bedNameNo]
"""



	#ystem.perspective.print(('Exec:',roomId)) 
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [roomId], 'RITIOps')
	return result

customMethods.name: joinRoomsAndFacilityLayoutList
customMethods.script:
#system.perspective.print(('input roomList:',type(roomList), roomList[:3]))
	#system.perspective.print(('input facilityLayoutList:',type(facilityLayoutList),  facilityLayoutList[:3]))
	if not(facilityLayoutList):
		return roomList
		
	import copy
	newRoomList = []
	
	for room in roomList:
		item = copy.deepcopy(room)
		_pos = ''
		for layoutRow in facilityLayoutList:
			if layoutRow['roomId'] == room['roomId']:
				_pos = layoutRow['position']
				break
				
		item['position'] = 	_pos
		#item['isVertical'] = layoutRow['isVertical']
		#item['isUpper'] = layoutRow['isUpper']
		newRoomList.append(item)
	return newRoomList

customMethods.name: getListOfDictFromDataset
customMethods.script:
_colNames = system.dataset.getColumnHeaders(dataset)
	
	if dataset.rowCount == 0:
		_lstData = [{col: None for col in _colNames}]
	else:
		_pyds = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(dataset)

	return _lstData

customMethods.name: saveToDb
customMethods.script:
roomId = params.get('roomId')
	facilityId = params.get('facilityId')
	rowSize = params.get('rowSize')
	colSize = params.get('colSize')
	jsonLayout = params.get('jsonLayout')
	timeCreated = system.date.now()
	userName = self.session.props.auth.user.userName

	system.perspective.print(('_userName:',userName)) 
	

		
	if facilityId is not None:
		args = [facilityId,rowSize,colSize,jsonLayout,timeCreated,userName]
		upsertQuery = """
		DECLARE @facilityId INT = ?
			,@rowSize INT = ?
			,@colSize INT = ?
			,@jsonLayout NVARCHAR(max) = ?
			,@timeCreated datetime = ?
			,@userName VARCHAR(100) = ?;
				
		IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [lodging].[FacilityLayout] WHERE facilityId = @facilityId) 
		BEGIN
			UPDATE [lodging].[FacilityLayout]
			SET [rowSize] = @rowSize
				,[colSize] = @colSize
				,[jsonLayout] = @jsonLayout
				,[timeCreated] = @timeCreated
				,[userName] = @userName
			WHERE [facilityId] = @facilityId 
		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO [lodging].[FacilityLayout]
				([facilityId]
				,[rowSize]
				,[colSize]
				,[jsonLayout]
				,[timeCreated]
				,[userName])
			VALUES (@facilityId ,@rowSize,@colSize,@jsonLayout,@timeCreated,@userName)
		END
		"""
	elif roomId is not None:
		args = [roomId,rowSize,colSize,jsonLayout,timeCreated,userName]
		upsertQuery = """
		DECLARE @roomId INT = ?
			,@rowSize INT = ?
			,@colSize INT = ?
			,@jsonLayout NVARCHAR(max) = ?
			,@timeCreated datetime = ?
			,@userName VARCHAR(100) = ?;
		
		IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [lodging].[RoomLayout] WHERE roomId = @roomId) 
		BEGIN
			UPDATE [lodging].[RoomLayout]
			SET [rowSize] = @rowSize
				,[colSize] = @colSize
				,[jsonLayout] = @jsonLayout
				,[timeCreated] = @timeCreated
				,[userName] = @userName
			WHERE [roomId] = @roomId 
		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO [lodging].[RoomLayout]
				([roomId]
				,[rowSize]
				,[colSize]
				,[jsonLayout]
				,[timeCreated]
				,[userName])
			VALUES (@roomId ,@rowSize,@colSize,@jsonLayout,@timeCreated,@userName)
		END
		"""
	elif layoutType == 'global':
		upsertQuery = """a
	"""
	else:
		raise 
	
	result = system.db.runPrepUpdate(upsertQuery,args,'RITIOps')
	
	system.perspective.print(('result:',result))

customMethods.name: getListRoomsByFacilityDb
customMethods.script:
query = 	"""
DECLARE @facilityId int = ?;
	
SELECT 
	 'room' AS [objectType]
	,[Facility].[id] AS [facilityId]
	,[Room].[id] AS [roomId]
	,[Facility].[facilityName]
	,[Room].[roomName]
	,'' AS [position]
	,[RoomLayout].[rowSize]
	,[RoomLayout].[colSize]
	,[RoomLayout].[jsonLayout]
	,'' AS [error]
FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] 
	INNER JOIN [lodging].[Facility] ON [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id]
	LEFT JOIN [lodging].[RoomLayout] ON [RoomLayout].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
WHERE [Facility].[timeRetired] is NULL 
	AND [Room].[timeRetired] is NULL
	AND [Facility].[Id] = @facilityId
ORDER BY [roomName]
"""



	#system.perspective.print(('Exec:',roomId)) 
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [facilityId], 'RITIOps')
	return result

customMethods.name: getListFacilitiesByGlobalDb
customMethods.script:
query = 	"""
SELECT 
	 [Facility].[Id] AS [facilityId]
	,[facilityName] 
	,'' AS [position]
	,[FacilityLayout].[rowSize]
	,[FacilityLayout].[colSize]
	,[FacilityLayout].[jsonLayout]
	--,'' AS [error]
	,(	SELECT
			 [Room].[id] AS [roomId]
			,[Room].[roomName]
			,[RoomLayout].[rowSize]
			,[RoomLayout].[colSize]
			,j.[position]
			,(SELECT *
				FROM OPENJSON([RoomLayout].[jsonLayout]) 
		  
				WITH (bedId			INT				'$.bedId',  
					  position		NVARCHAR(10)	'$.position',
					  isVertical	bit				'$.isVertical',
					  isUpper		bit				'$.isUpper')
				FOR JSON PATH) AS [jsonLayout]
		FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] 
			LEFT JOIN [lodging].[RoomLayout] ON [RoomLayout].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
			INNER JOIN OPENJSON([FacilityLayout].[jsonLayout]) 
						WITH (	roomId		INT				'$.roomId',  
								position	NVARCHAR(10)	'$.position') j ON j.[roomId] = [Room].[id]
		WHERE [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[Id]
		FOR JSON PATH
		) AS roomsLayout
FROM [lodging].[Facility]
	LEFT JOIN [lodging].[FacilityLayout] ON [FacilityLayout].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id]
WHERE [Facility].[timeRetired] is NULL 
ORDER BY [facilityName]
"""



	#system.perspective.print(('Exec:',roomId)) 
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [], 'RITIOps')
	return result
